fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.architectures

Class ComponentModelArchitecture

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.architectures.Architecture
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.architectures.ComponentModelArchitecture
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ComponentModelArchitectureI, fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.architectures.ArchitectureI, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RTComponentModelArchitecture

    public class ComponentModelArchitecture
extends fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.architectures.Architecture
implements ComponentModelArchitectureI
    The class ComponentModelArchitecture extends DEVS simulation architectures to include information about the mapping of simulation models to BCM components and provides methods used by the supervisor component to create the system-wide simulator from this architecture onto the component assembly.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2018-06-26

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:

      compose the simulation architecture subtree having the model with URI modelURI at its root by recursively composing the submodels and creating the required coupled model on the component creator that must hold it in the assembly, which has created the required plug-in plugin.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ComponentModelArchitecture

        public ComponentModelArchitecture(java.lang.String architectureURI,
                                  java.lang.String rootModelURI,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.architectures.AbstractAtomicModelDescriptor> atomicModelDescriptors,
                                  java.util.Map<java.lang.String,fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.models.architectures.CoupledModelDescriptor> coupledModelDescriptors,
                                  java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit simulationTimeUnit)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        create a component model architecture.

        Contract

         pre     architectureURI != null && !architectureURI.isEmpty()
 pre     rootModelURI != null && !rootModelURI.isEmpty()
 pre     atomicModelDescriptors != null
 pre     coupledModelDescriptors != null
 pre     simulationTimeUnit != null
 pre     atomicModelDescriptors.containsKey(rootModelURI) || coupledModelDescriptors.containsKey(rootModelURI)
 pre     forall md in atomicModelDescriptors.values() : md instanceof ComponentAtomicModelDescriptor 
 pre     forall md in coupledModelDescriptors.values() : md instanceof ComponentCoupledModelDescriptor 
 post    !isComplete() || Architecture.checkInvariant(this)
 post    !isComplete() || ComponentModelArchitecture.checkInvariant(this)
        Parameters:
        architectureURI - URI of the architecture.
        rootModelURI - URI of the root model in the architecture.
        atomicModelDescriptors - map from atomic model URIs to their atomic model descriptors.
        coupledModelDescriptors - map from coupled model URIs to their coupled model descriptors.
        simulationTimeUnit - time unit for the simulation clocks.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.

      • compose

        public fr.sorbonne_u.devs_simulation.interfaces.ModelDescriptionI compose(java.lang.String modelURI,
                                                                          fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent creator,
                                                                          java.lang.String pnipURI,
                                                                          AbstractSimulatorPlugin plugin)
                                                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from interface: ComponentModelArchitectureI
        compose the simulation architecture subtree having the model with URI modelURI at its root by recursively composing the submodels and creating the required coupled model on the component creator that must hold it in the assembly, which has created the required plug-in plugin.

        Contract

         pre    modelURI != null
 pre    creator != null
 pre     plugin != null && plugin.getPluginURI().equals(modelURI)
 post   true                    // no postcondition.
        Specified by:
        compose in interface ComponentModelArchitectureI
        Parameters:
        modelURI - URI of the coupled model to be composed.
        creator - component that executes the method and that holds the model.
        pnipURI - parent notification inbound port URI of the creator component.
        plugin - coordination plug-in of the creator.
        Returns:
        the reference to the simulation engine executing the model.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
        See Also:
        ComponentModelArchitectureI.compose(java.lang.String, fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent, java.lang.String, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.AbstractSimulatorPlugin)
